roleset.name: gettin' down dancing
roleset.note: BOOGIE-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: tango (51.5) (from boogie.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: theme, partner or body part made to dance, explicit mention of dance itself

example.name: Beyonce
example.text: She was boogieing to a couple of her own tracks, like Naughty Girl and Beautiful Liar.
example.arg: to a couple of her own tracks, like Naughty Girl and Beautiful Liar.

example.name: With theme
example.text: She was boogieing her wee booty off to it.

example.name: Different sort of theme...rough night!
example.text: She drank copious amounts of anything she could lay her hands on, she boogied the night away, fell over a few times, and got mud all over her purple frock.
